description: I know everybody has wonder about their roommates, or at least wondering if they are into you. Everything gets resolved for this particular guy, when his roommate and him finally do something about it. It was a Friday night, and everybody is getting ready to go out to this awesome frat party. The roommate comes in and wants nothing to do with parties and going out. Once they all leave him alone, he began to play with himself in front of the camera, when all of a sudden everybody walks right back in, catching him in the act, sort of speak. Feeling all embarrassed about the whole thing, his roommates wants to make him feel better, so he offers to finish the job for him. Believe it or not, the dude said yes, and thats when everything got super dupper freaky dikky. this is definitely one night these roommates will never forget.
title: We Are Roommates
